learning_outcomes: 4.1.1.1 Identify the basic parts of an eye.
4.1.1.2 State the function of eyes

4.1.2.2 State the function of ears.
4.1.3.1 Identify the parts of the skin.
4.1.3.2 State the functions of the skin.
4.2.1.1 Describe the care for eyes
4.2.1.2 Describe the care for ears
4.2.1.3 Describe the care of the feet.
4.2.1.4 Describe the care for the skin

4.2.2.2 Explain the effects of dehydration.
4.2.2.3 Explain how to prevent and treat dehydration
4.2.3.1 Identify traditional and conventional medicines for common ailments.
4.3.1.1 Explain the importance of forests to people and other forms of life.

4.3.1.3 Describe ways of conserving forests.
4.3.2.1 Explain how to control the wild animal population in the GMA
4.3.2.2 Explain threats to wildlife
4.3.2.3 State the importance of conserving wildlife.
4.3.3.1 Classify soil samples according to types

4.3.4.1 Identify different types of pollution.
4.3.4.2 Identify the sources pollution in the community
4.3.4.2 Explain ways of conserving natural resources.
4.4.1.1 Describe the functions of parts of the flowering plant.

4.4.2.2 Investigate factors necessary for plant growth

4.4.3.3 State the importance of animals in the community.
4.5.1.1 Name two types of force
4.5.1.2 Describe what forces can do

4.5.2.1 Demonstrate the existence of air

4.5.2.2 Explain advantages and disadvantages of strong winds.
